Text: Lev Yashin Cup (Russian: ВТБ Кубок Льва Яшина ) is an annual summer international football tournament in memory of the Soviet goalkeeper of the USSR national football team and FC Dynamo Moscow Lev Yashin, played in Moscow and Khimki, Russia.

<Text: Lev Yashin Cup:  The rights to the tournament name owned bank VTB.>
